paragraph: Bartłomiej Świderski (born 7 March 1973 in Wrocław, Poland) is a Polish actor and singer. He was the vocalist of the former group Grejfrut, and has now embarked on a solo singing career.
Świderski attended the Bolesław Chrobry High School in Bielawa, following which he graduated from Lart studiO acting school in Kraków in 1994 and the National Film School in Łódź in 1998.
